TopicTitle: Fairing not showing up in tech tree w/procedural fairing

Articles.Content:
I am using procedural fairing in a science save and I can't seem to access it. Normal fairing is no longer in the tech tree, and I can't figure out how to use the mod to create fairing. Is this normal? How do I use fairing? 

 

EDIT: I am also using Near Future series and Community Tech Tree.
